data.expected_result: The category should disappear as it does on Desktop.
data.short_description: Collapsed categories with voice channels in that you are forbidden to see (but once could) do not disappear.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server where you have basic permissions. Ask the owner to create a category with one voice channel in it that you have permission to see. - Then collapse that category so the voice channel is hidden. - Now ask the owner to take away your permission to see the voice channel. The category doesn't disappear (but does on Desktop). - You can even close and relaunch the app. The category is still visible. It only disappears once you try to uncollapse it.
